properties.question: What are the characteristic features of a typical melanoma based on the provided photograph?
properties.option_a: Symmetrical pigmented lesion with uniform margins, monochromatic coloration, 10mm in diameter, stable over time.
properties.option_b: Asymmetric pigmented lesion with irregular margins, heterogeneously coloured, 18mm in diameter, recently changed.
properties.option_c: Asymmetric pigmented lesion with smooth margins, homogeneously coloured, 5mm in diameter, rapidly growing.
properties.option_d: Symmetrical pigmented lesion with regular margins, varying coloration, 20mm in diameter, no recent changes.
